name: Brume
description:
Brume is a cinematic, challenging adventure game.



The player discovers a foggy deserted island. On their way to the old castle they will encounter dangers such as knights, slugs, beetles, and ghosts.

Move at your own pace, walk on beaches, through forests and marshes. Make sure to take a rest every now and then, and explore every nook and cranny of the land to recover lost artefacts that might aid you on your journey.

Level the weapons you find by using them in battle, learn the weaknesses of your foes, and find your way through these crooked lands.

Features
  • 6+ different weapons to find & wield
  • 5+ difficult boss enemies to fight
  • 10+ achievements to acquire
  • Multiple "challenge runs" to unlock & try
